he Invisible Stalker language, properly known as Sshai,"Sshai" was originally presented as an alternative name for invisible stalkers in the indices of Creature Catalogue. was the racial language of invisible stalkers, a race of elemental beings native to the Elemental Plane of Air.
The sounds of this language were reminiscent of the roaring and whooshing that could be heard during wind storms.
* Mempter, a mysterious and powerful elementalist mage.
